taskDescription: Drag to arrange the images in the correct sequence
altTaskDescription: Make the following list be ordered correctly. Use the cursor keys to navigate through the list items, use space to activate or deactivate an item and the cursor keys to move it

sequenceImages.imageDescription: Start with a phrase. A phrase is a short sentence or  a small group of words.
Then write down just the first letter of each word of the phrase.
Then choose some letters to capitalize.
Then add 1 or 2 numbers.Can any numbers replace the letters?  For example, can you use 0 (zero) instead of O (letter)?
Then add 1 or 2 symbols.Can any symbols replace the letters?  For example, can you use $ instead of S?
